content: Ideas, and ideally contributions, on how to prevent such errors are welcome :) . I think both distinctive semantic highlighting for auto implicits and a linter for catching similarly named variables would be worthwhile additions.
haha, wow, I managed to produce a typo in my MWE that was completely independent of my typo in the original code (which was also the case there) :see_no_evil:
Andrés Goens has marked this topic as resolved.
